title: On the Women & Co. Blog: Rosy or Gloomy?
summary: In a new blog post, Women & Co.'s Cassandra Pare discusses how recent Citibank survey results reveal U.S. women are remaining optimistic about their personal financial situations, in spite of the country's daunting economic outlook.
tag-1: On the Women & Co. Blog: Rosy or Gloomy?
